author: Special Correspondent
title: Congress complaint against Minister
description: Congress leaders have complained against Women and Child Welfare Minister Shashikala Jolle for violating lockdown protocols in Nippani town on Sunday. The Minister has violated provisions of CrPC sect
content:
Congress leaders have complained against Women and Child Welfare Minister Shashikala Jolle for violating lockdown protocols in Nippani town on Sunday. 
The Minister has violated provisions of CrPC section 144 and the COVID lockdown protocol by organising an … [+780 chars]
